languages.text: "Вместе выступить против общей угрозы — разве не так поступают разумные существа?"
"Standing united against a common threat. Is it not what sentient creatures do?"
languages.original_text: "Вместе выступить против общей угрозы — разве не так поступают разумные существа?"

traits.locale_text: "Standing united against a common threat. Is it not what sentient creatures do?"
"Standing united against a common threat. Is it not what sentient creatures do?"
"Standing united against a common threat. Is it not what sentient creatures do?"
"Standing united against a common threat. Is it not what sentient creatures do?"
"Standing united against a common threat. Is it not what sentient creatures do?"

languages.text: “团结一致，面对共同的威胁。这才是有智慧的生物该做的事情，是吧？”
languages.original_text: "Standing united against a common threat. Is it not what sentient creatures do?"

traits.locale_text: “团结一致，面对共同的威胁。这才是有智慧的生物该做的事情，是吧？”

languages.text: «Lucharemos juntos contra una amenaza común. ¿Acaso no es eso lo que hacen las especies inteligentes?».
languages.original_text: "Standing united against a common threat. Is it not what sentient creatures do?"

traits.locale_text: «Lucharemos juntos contra una amenaza común. ¿Acaso no es eso lo que hacen las especies inteligentes?».

languages.text: 「共通の脅威に対して一致団結する。それが感情を持つ生き物のすることではないのか？」
languages.original_text: "Standing united against a common threat. Is it not what sentient creatures do?"

traits.locale_text: 「共通の脅威に対して一致団結する。それが感情を持つ生き物のすることではないのか？」

languages.text: "Vereint gegen eine gemeinsame Gefahr stehen. Ist es denn nicht genau das, was intelligente Wesen tun?"
languages.original_text: "Standing united against a common threat. Is it not what sentient creatures do?"

traits.locale_text: "Vereint gegen eine gemeinsame Gefahr stehen. Ist es denn nicht genau das, was intelligente Wesen tun?"

languages.text: « Unir ses forces face à une menace commune, n'est-ce pas le propre des créatures intelligentes ? »
languages.original_text: "Standing united against a common threat. Is it not what sentient creatures do?"

traits.locale_text: « Unir ses forces face à une menace commune, n'est-ce pas le propre des créatures intelligentes ? »

languages.text: "Ortak bir düşmana karşı birleşmek... Akıl sahibi varlıkların yapması gereken de bu değil midir?"
languages.original_text: "Standing united against a common threat. Is it not what sentient creatures do?"
